alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 12:37AM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schroon River at Riverbank. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water reaches moderate flood stage. Water surrounds several homes on Schroon River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:01 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to reach moderate flood stage early Tuesday afternoon and crest at 8.3 feet during the early morning hours Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Schroon River Riverbank Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Tue 12 am: 7.1 Forecast: Tue 1 am 7.2 Tue 7 am 7.6 Tue 1 pm 8.0 Tue 7 pm 8.2 Wed 1 am 8.3 Wed 7 am 8.3 Wed 1 pm 8.3 Wed 7 pm 8.3 Thu 1 am 8.2 Thu 7 am 8.1 Thu 1 pm 8.0 Thu 7 pm 7.9 &&
